job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: ltpgtAs an ML Engineer you will assist with the development of the model training and evaluation infrastructure You will work closely with data scientists to experiment on model architecture and take them into production Youll build maintain and improve data processing pipelines that process billions of data points and petabytes of data Youll work in an interdisciplinary team composed of data scientists bioinformaticians biologists and software engineers to help solve hard problems which improve biological research and ultimately health outcomes across all of biologyltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtMinimum QualificationsltpgtltulgtltligtThis is an onsite position  not remote Work from home as appropriateltligtltligtBachelors in computer science data science or equivalentltligtltligtExpertise in working with at least one deep learning framework such as PyTorch TensorFlow CaffeltligtltligtStrong analytical and problemsolving skillsltligtltligtAbility to understand and execute the companys mission and valuesltligtltligtMaintain a high degree of ethical standard and trustworthinessltligtltligtStrong technical written and oral communication skillsltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtPreferred Qualificationsltpgtltulgtltligt2 years software development experienceltligtltligtProficient in PythonltligtltligtExperienced in cloud providers such as GCP or AWSltligtltligtExperienced in working with ETL pipelinesltligtltligtA track record for delivering Machine Learning projects for a productltligtltligtExcellent written and verbal communication skillsltligtltligtStrong and proactive communication natural curiosity Ambition to apply skills to a wide variety of fieldsltligtltligtBe able and open to pick up new skills work with 3rd party technologies and devicesltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtThis role is NOT remote  Work from home Flexltpgt
